Shadow Wing::

She put her hand on Lunarpine's shoulder.
"He's right. Stand down.  But just for now.   If we can get our 
comrad back in one piece, it's worth the try."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus::
> 
> Ramulus shakes his head. "No, Lunarpine. Hold your fire, thats an 
order," he 
> raises his voice as he says the last sentence, so that everyone 
there can 
> hear him.
> 
> Ramulus takes several steps forward. "Very well, Shuko. A five day 
truce, and 
> 50 kilos of energon from you, and give us Ramhorn back unharmed. 
You may 
> leave safely then."
> 
> He keeps his gun ready, in case the Newcomer wasn't about to uphold 
his deal. 
> Ramulus didn't expect them to give the energon, but as long as the 
situation 
> was solved peacefully without any casualties, it was worth it.
